WorkItem.Description:
No matter what I do, or what items I choose, I constantly get 140 more hp on rawr then on my my armory profile/in game stats. 
I have for example 48709 hp unbuffed now, but rawr shows me at 48849 for some reason. This has been the case for a couple of versions now, and didn't see any discussions about it. 
 
Maybe it's only my version that buged, but I doubt it, or something I'm doing wrong.
Ragingsoul  on Darsorrow. 
 
http://www.wow-heroes.com/index.php?zone=eu&server=Darksorrow&name=ragingsoul
linked the xml file

Comments.Message: I get 48709 using the file you uploaded.  Are you using version 2.3.8?  If so, is your item cache up to date?
thx for the reply, it was the cache, didn't think I needed to refresh it. problem solved then.
